Acid Bite.Description: Bite with acid teeth, lowering the target's defense.

Acid Rain.Description: Acid rains from the sky lowering the opposing team's defense by 2 stages.

Agility Training.Description: Focus the body to increase the user's speed.

All In.Description: The user goes all in, raising its attack by 2 stages, and lowering its defense by 2 stages.

Artificial Night.Description: Summon the twilight, increasing the effectiveness of ghost Coromon.

Ball of Darkness.Description: Launch a ball of pure shadow at the target. Has a 50% chance to increase the user's special attack by 1 stage.

Ball of Light.Description: Launch a ball of pure light at the target. Lowers the target's special defense.

Beat Up.Description: The user gets revenge for its squad, hitting once, plus one extra hit for each fainted squad member.

Berserk.Description: The user goes berserk for 4 rounds, increasing damage dealt after each successful attack. Damage returns to normal when the user calms down.

Blaze Feathers.Description: Creates a ring of flaming feathers to spiral into the target, dealing damage and draining its [hp] for 25% of the damage done.

Blazing Coals.Description: The user lays a field of burning hot coals, creating a Fire entry hazard that inflicts burn on opposing Coromon being sent into battle.

Blizzard.Description: Summon a powerful blizzard which damages the opposing team. Has a 10% chance to freeze them.

Coin Snatch.Description: Steal [currency.gold] from the opposing trainer, up to 3 times.

Concentrate.Description: The user increases its concentration, raising its [stat.criticalHitChance] by 1 stage.

Confusion.Description: Confuses the opposing team, making them [condition.hazy].

Constrict.Description: Wrap around the target, trapping the target and lowering its [stat.speed] for 5 rounds.

Constricting Flames.Description: Liquid hot magma surrounds the target, inflicting [condition.burn] and preventing escape for 5 rounds.

Corrupt.Description: Corrupts the target, lowering its [stat.attack] and [stat.specialAttack] by 3 stages.

Corrupted Storm.Description: Catches all targets in a storm of corruption.

Crackle Horn.Description: Attempts to gore the target with a highly electrified horn, instantly fainting the target if it hits.

Crumble.Description: Petrify the target from the inside-out. Deals damage and makes the target fragile, lowering their [stat.defense] by 1 stage.

Crunch.Description: Crush the target with powerful jaws. Has a 25% chance to make the target bleed.

Crushing Waterfall.Description: The user charges up, and unleashes a crushing flood of water upon the target. Lowers the target's [stat.specialDefense] by 1 stage.

Crystal Barrage.Description: Attack the target with a furious barrage of pointy crystals. Has a 50% chance to make the target bleed.

Crystal Beam.Description: The user summons an ice crystal which fires a freezing beam at the target. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

Crystal Shot.Description: Shoot 1 to 3 crystal projectiles at the target, with a 25% increased [stat.criticalHitChance].

Crystal Surprise.Description: Surround the opponent with sharp spikes to prevent them from escaping.

Cute Pose.Description: The user strikes a cute pose, lowering the [stat.defense] of the opposing team.

Death Grip.Description: Holds the target in a death grip, instantly fainting the target if it hits.

Deep Cut.Description: Furiously scratch the target, making the target bleed. Has a 50% chance to increase the user's [stat.attack] by 1 stage.

Desert Hurricane.Description: A field of sand tornadoes rips through all foes, dealing big damage.

Desert Winds.Description: Summon a powerful sandstorm, increasing the effectiveness of [type.sand] Coromon.

Detonate.Description: The user overheats and bursts into flames, inflicting massive damage to the opposing team. Lowers the user's [stat.specialAttack] by 1 stage.

Dirty Snow.Description: Throws dirty snow at the target, dealing damage and making the target [condition.hazy].

Disable.Description: Disable the target's last used move for 5 rounds.

Disable Heal.Description: Prevents the target from recovering [hp] for 5 rounds.

Disruption.Description: Creates a disruption, dealing huge damage to the target and lowering a random stat by 2 stages.

Distort.Description: Creates a distortion, lowering the target's [stat.defense] and [stat.specialDefense] by 2 stages.

Distract.Description: The user moves so fast that it creates illusions of itself. Raises the user's [stat.evasion].

Double Slash.Description: Slash at the target. In normal circumstances this attack will always hit.

Double Sting.Description: Two quick successive stings strike the target, each dealing damage. This attack always goes first.

Drain.Description: Deal damage and drain [hp] for half of the damage done.

Dust Storm.Description: Damages all foes with a frenzied dust storm.

Electric Pound.Description: Smash the target on its head for 1 to 3 times. Every hit has a 6% chance to knock down the target.

Electrify.Description: The user charges itself, increasing damage of its next [type.electric] attack 1.5 times and doubling the [stat.criticalHitChance]. This can electrify a Coromon twice.

EMP.Description: Powerful electrical interference causes all opponents to revert their stat changes, and deplete their [sp] by 15%.

Empathy.Description: Set the target's [hp] to your current [hp]. This move always goes last.

Energy Drain.Description: Drain the opponent's [hp] and convert it to [sp].

Enveloping Darkness.Description: Envelop all targets in darkness, lowering their [stat.evasion] by 6 stages.

Epiphany.Description: The user has an epiphany, raising its [stat.attack] and [stat.defense].

Face Slap.Description: Give the target a high-five, in the face. Has a 50% chance to make the target [condition.hazy].

Factory Reset.Description: Reset to default, reverting all of the user's stat changes.

Fade Attack.Description: Sneak up on the target, dealing damage. This attack always goes first.

Splash.Description: Splash the target, dealing damage equal to the target's level.

Toxic Skull.Description: The user throws a skull covered in toxic molds at the target, dealing some damage and causing poison.

Voodoo.Description: Inflict damage on a random target, including opponents not in battle. This attack always goes last.

Water Clone.Description: Creates a clone afterimage of the user, increasing the user's [stat.evasion] by 2 stages.

Whirlpool.Description: Summon a whirlpool which deals damage and has a 15% chance to knock down the target.

Whoosh.Description: The user launches a speedy whoosh of wind. The power increases with the [stat.speed] of the user and decreases with the [stat.speed] of the target.

Wind Blast.Description: Using its wings the user sends a powerful blast of wind towards the target, dealing damage.

Withdraw.Description: The user withdraws into its shell, increasing [stat.defense] and [stat.specialDefense] by 1 stage.

Zen Cure.Description: Restores 15% of [hp] and removes a status condition to restore another 15% of [hp], if present.
